attributes.action: acknowledge the recent ministerial announcement regarding the detrimental effect upon the country which the current level of unfettered immigration is having and immediately close our borders to all incomers from midnight tonight for a minimum of FIVE YEARS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ministers in our elected government have acknowledged that our country is suffering because of unfettered immigration.  It is within the gift of those ministers to put the situation right by closing our borders for a minimum of five years to give time for us to find out who is here; whether or not they are here illegally; deport those who are not here legally; instal proper controls and entry regulations, all of which, if properly applied, will make this country a better place for everybody.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
